basicInfo.name: Orly
basicInfo.flavor: Orly clashed with Yeonhee, whom she met while trying to stop the War of Destruction. As a result, she became able to wield all white magic. Afterwards, she founded the Night Crows with Teo, and worked to stop the Power of Destruction.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Ally with Lowest Current HP (Excluding Self)
 - Adds Effect: 15% Continuous Healing. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Noble Meteor
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Magic Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 36% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Lightstream
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 20% of Magic Attack plus 5% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 19% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 22% of Magic Attack plus 6% of the caster's Max HP.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 23% of Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self, Magic Allies
 - Adds Effect: 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: All-Seeing Light
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 39% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 45% of Max HP.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self, Magic Allies
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Teo, Night Crows, hometown family, Asgar style salad, order, kindness, white magic, research, studying
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Yeonhee, hard food, chaos, evil, staying home alone
profile.story: Orly clashed with Yeonhee, whom she met while trying to stop the War of Destruction. As a result, she became able to wield all white magic. Afterwards, she founded the Night Crows with Teo, and worked to stop the Power of Destruction.

basicInfo.name: Orly
basicInfo.flavor: Orly fell in love with Teo, whom she met on Moonlit Isle, and they went to war together, saving many lives. After the war ended and her friend, Ace's grandfather, died, she headed to the Endless Rampart with Teo.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 11% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Noble Meteor
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 13% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Lightstream
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 17% of Magic Attack plus 5% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 17% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 17% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: All-Seeing Light
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 35% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 13%.
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 19%.

profile.story: Orly fell in love with Teo, whom she met on Moonlit Isle, and they went to war together, saving many lives. After the war ended and her friend, Ace's grandfather, died, she headed to the Endless Rampart with Teo.

basicInfo.name: Orly
basicInfo.flavor: Orly always had innate talent, but showed little interest in magic. After her fiancé died, she turned to White Magic. She entered the School of Magic at a late age, but graduated with perfect scores on all exams as the youngest student.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Noble Meteor
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 11% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Lightstream
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 17% of Magic Attack plus 4% of the caster's Max HP 2 time(s).
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 15% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 17% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: All-Seeing Light
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 31% of the caster's Max HP. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Allies (Self, Magic)
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 9%.
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 13%.
